AVEVA Group plc

Director/PDMR Shareholding

 

AVEVA Group plc announces that on 7 July 2021 it was notified of the following share option exercise and sale of shares which took place:

James Kidd, Deputy CEO and CFO

On 6 July 2021 Mr Kidd exercised options over 6,691 shares following the 2019 and 2020 awards under the AVEVA Group Deferred Share Bonus Plan. Mr Kidd sold 3,155 of the resulting shares at a price of £38.86 per share to settle associated tax and national insurance liabilities.
